column1: ha kebatle ha mololo aetsa pele ho wena
nketsetse tlou ya nko e telele
etsa tlou e telele hangwe he
uhanne ha kere unketsetse tlou e nko e telele
eskaroba siphi ya ofalolo ya mololo
hoba uhana hoetsa tlou e nko e telele
seka itsireletsa ha keutlwe uipatile tlasa bethe
ako jwetse ausi mamello hore uya kae
ufihle ure ausi mamello keatsamaya keya kliniking
na ujwetsitse mololo hore hona le dithuto tsencha tsefihlang mola sekolong
seka tsa mololo diaparo tsa sekolo
ako leetse ntho ena kebone na etlaloka
e kebatla hobona etlamatha ke ya mang
tsamaya hojwetsa mme mami hore ukhathetse
jwale ena ore ourata ha kae
